verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

צַ֚ו <S%H6680><s%> tzav Command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קָרְבָּנִ֨י <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-ba-Ni unto them My offering לַחְמִ֜י <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mi [and] my bread לְאִשַּׁ֗י <S%H801><s%> le-'ish-Shai, for my sacrifices made by fire רֵ֚יחַ <S%H7381><s%> Rei-ach savour נִֽיחֹחִ֔י <S%H5207><s%> ni-cho-Chi, [for] a sweet תִּשְׁמְר֕וּ <S%H8104><s%> tish-me-Ru unto me shall ye observe לְהַקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> le-hak-Riv to offer לִ֖י li בְּמוֹעֲדֽוֹ׃ <S%H4150><s%> be-mo-'a-Do. unto me in their due season

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta And thou shalt say לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This הָֽאִשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H801><s%> ha-'ish-Sheh, unto them This [is] the offering made by fire אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תַּקְרִ֖יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> tak-Ri-vu which ye shall offer לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כְּבָשִׂ֨ים <S%H3532><s%> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the first שָׁנָ֧ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year תְמִימִ֛ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim without spot שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim two לַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> lai-Yom day by day עֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah burnt offering תָמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid. [for] a continual

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֥בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> hak-Ke-ves lamb אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad The one תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou offer בַבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> vab-Bo-ker; in the morning וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכֶּ֣בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> hak-Ke-ves lamb הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, and the other תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou offer בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein at הָֽעַרְבָּֽיִם׃ <S%H6153><s%> Ha-'ar-Ba-yim. at even

וַעֲשִׂירִ֧ית <S%H6224><s%> va-'a-si-Rit And a tenth הָאֵיפָ֛ה <S%H374><s%> ha-'ei-Fah [part] of an ephah סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let of flour לְמִנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> le-min-Chah; for a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֛ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בְּשֶׁ֥מֶן <S%H8081><s%> be-She-men oil כָּתִ֖ית <S%H3795><s%> ka-Tit of beaten רְבִיעִ֥ת <S%H7243><s%> re-vi-'It with the fourth הַהִֽין׃ <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin. [part] of an hin

עֹלַ֖ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lat burnt offering תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid; [It is] a continual הָעֲשֻׂיָה֙ <S%H6213><s%> ha-'a-su-Yah which was ordained בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai, Sinai לְרֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> le-Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach, for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh a sacrifice made by fire לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וְנִסְכּוֹ֙ <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-Ko And the drink offering רְבִיעִ֣ת <S%H7243><s%> re-vi-'It thereof [shall be] the fourth הַהִ֔ין <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin, [part] of an hin לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad; for the one בַּקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> bak-Ko-desh, in the holy הַסֵּ֛ךְ <S%H5258><s%> has-Sech to be poured נֶ֥סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> Ne-sech [for] a drink offering שֵׁכָ֖ר <S%H7941><s%> she-Char [place] shalt thou cause the strong wine לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכֶּ֣בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> hak-Ke-ves lamb הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, And the other תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou offer בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> bein at הָֽעַרְבָּ֑יִם <S%H6153><s%> ha-'ar-Ba-yim; at even כְּמִנְחַ֨ת <S%H4503><s%> ke-min-Chat as the meat offering הַבֹּ֤קֶר <S%H1242><s%> hab-Bo-ker of the morning וּכְנִסְכּוֹ֙ <S%H5262><s%> u-che-nis-Ko and as the drink offering תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh, thereof thou shalt offer אִשֵּׁ֛ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh [it] a sacrifice made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD פ Peh

וּבְיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> u-ve-yOm day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat, And on the sabbath שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> she-nei- two כְבָשִׂ֥ים <S%H3532><s%> che-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year תְּמִימִ֑ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim; without spot וּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Nei and two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֗ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim, tenth סֹ֧לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let deals of flour מִנְחָ֛ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֥ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-She-men with oil וְנִסְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-Ko. and the drink offering

עֹלַ֥ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lat [This is] the burnt offering שַׁבַּ֖ת <S%H7676><s%> shab-Bat of every sabbath בְּשַׁבַּתּ֑וֹ <S%H7676><s%> be-shab-bat-To; sabbath עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- addition עֹלַ֥ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid beside the continual וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-Kah. and his drink offering ס sa-Mek

וּבְרָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> u-ve-ra-Shei And in the beginnings חָדְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <S%H2320><s%> cha-de-shei-Chem, of your months תַּקְרִ֥יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> tak-Ri-vu ye shall offer עֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah a burnt offering לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God פָּרִ֨ים <S%H6499><s%> pa-Rim bullocks בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the first בָקָ֤ר <S%H1241><s%> va-Kar young שְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim two וְאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ve-'A-yil ram אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, and one כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <S%H3532><s%> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- old שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year שִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah seven תְּמִימִֽם׃ <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim. without spot

וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> u-she-lo-Shah And three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֗ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim, tenth deals סֹ֤לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let of flour מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-She-men, with oil לַפָּ֖ר <S%H6499><s%> lap-Par bullock הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad; for one וּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Nei and two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֗ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim, tenth סֹ֤לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let deals of flour מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-She-men, with oil לָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil ram הָֽאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> Ha-'e-Chad. for one

וְעִשָּׂרֹ֣ן <S%H6241><s%> ve-'is-sa-Ron And a several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֗וֹן <S%H6241><s%> is-sa-Ron, tenth סֹ֤לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let of flour מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah [for] a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-She-men, with oil לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad; unto one עֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah [for] a burnt offering רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach, of a sweet אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh a sacrifice made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֗ם <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-kei-Hem, And their drink offerings חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi shall be half הַהִין֩ <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin an hin יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לַפָּ֜ר <S%H6499><s%> lap-Par unto a bullock וּשְׁלִישִׁ֧ת <S%H7992><s%> u-she-li-Shit and the third הַהִ֣ין <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin [part] of an hin לָאַ֗יִל <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil, unto a ram וּרְבִיעִ֥ת <S%H7243><s%> u-re-vi-'It and a fourth הַהִ֛ין <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin [part] of an hin לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lak-Ke-ves unto a lamb יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin; of wine זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise עֹלַ֥ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lat this [is] the burnt offering חֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> cho-desh of every month בְּחָדְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H2320><s%> be-cha-de-Sho, throughout the months לְחָדְשֵׁ֖י <S%H2320><s%> le-cha-de-Shei the months הַשָּׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nah. of the year

וּשְׂעִ֨יר <S%H8163><s%> u-se-'Ir kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim of the goats אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad And one לְחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> le-chat-Tat for a sin offering לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- addition עֹלַ֧ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִ֛יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid beside the continual יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ye-'a-Seh shall be offered וְנִסְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-Ko. and his drink offering ס sa-Mek

וּבַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> u-va-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, of the first בְּאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> be-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֛ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh; month פֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> Pe-sach [is] the passover לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וּבַחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> u-va-cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen י֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh of this month הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh of this חָ֑ג <S%H2282><s%> Chag; [is] the feast שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim, days מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> matz-Tzot shall unleavened bread יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Chel. be eaten

בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon In the first מִקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> mik-ra- convocation קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh; [shall be] an holy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dah no manner of servile לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su. ye shall do

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-rav-Tem But ye shall offer אִשֶּׁ֤ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh a sacrifice made by fire עֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah [for] a burnt offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD פָּרִ֧ים <S%H6499><s%> pa-Rim bullocks בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the first בָקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> va-Kar young שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim two וְאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ve-'A-yil ram אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; and one וְשִׁבְעָ֤ה <S%H7651><s%> ve-shiv-'Ah and seven כְבָשִׂים֙ <S%H3532><s%> che-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei old שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year תְּמִימִ֖ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim they shall be unto you without blemish יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu having לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וּמִ֨נְחָתָ֔ם <S%H4503><s%> u-Min-cha-Tam, And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-Sha-men; with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֜ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לַפָּ֗ר <S%H6499><s%> lap-Par, for a bullock וּשְׁנֵ֧י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Nei and two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֛ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil for a ram תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su. shall ye offer
